subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In less than two seasons, the Marlins’ Gaby Sanchez has established himself with the likes of Chipper Jones and Pat Burrell as notorious Mets nemeses, at least statistically.
snippet: In less than two seasons, the Marlins’ Gaby Sanchez has established himself with the likes of Chipper Jones and Pat Burrell as notorious Mets nemeses, at least statistically.
